Header.heading: Account Opening Portal
Header.description: Effortlessly open your bank account with Omera Bank Portal! Just scan the QR code or upload it for instant verification, following the steps below.

account_page.success_message: You have successfully logged into Omera Bank using eSignet
account_page.subtext: Open your bank account in just a few simple steps
account_page.step_open_account: Click on "Open Account" to get started

account_result.account_created_message: Your account has been successfully created!

application.details_description: Fill in your information to open your account.
application.result_description: Get your account opening status instantly!

form.details_description: Fill in your account information, review the pre-filled details, and submit to proceed.
form.transfer_capabilities_description: Transfer capabilities will be enabled based on your account type and verification level.
form.terms_and_conditions: I hereby declare that all the information provided is true and accurate. I consent to background verification based on my tax profile.

camera_access.camera_access_denied_description: We need your camera to scan the code. Go to your browser settings and allow camera access for this website.

stepper.upload_qr_code_description: Upload a file that contains a QR code.
stepper.verify_document_description: Verification for the document or card is in progress.
stepper.scan_qr_code_description: Click 'Scan' to start scanning the document or card with a QR code.
stepper.activate_camera: Activate Camera and Position QR Code
stepper.activate_camera_description: Activate your device camera and hold the QR code within the frame to initiate verification.
stepper.verify_process_description: The QR code verification is in progress.

modal.verification_success: Your identity has been successfully verified and you are eligible to open an account!
modal.verified_message: Congratulations! Based on your verified identity, you qualify for a monthly transaction limit of {{limit}}. This enhanced limit enables you to access premium banking features and enjoy greater financial flexibility.
modal.unverified_message: You can proceed with a basic account with a monthly transaction limit of {{limit}}. To unlock higher limits and premium features, we recommend verifying your identity.
